    • getOfferType

      public boolean getOfferType()
      Returns the offer type. If it is true, customer shopping the online. Else customer shopping in branch.
      Returns:
      offer type

    • setOfferType

      public void setOfferType​(boolean offerType)
      Sets the offer type. If customer shopping the online, offer type is true. Else false.
      Parameters:
      offerType - online or in branch
